artist: Artist: Antonio Frasconi; Author: Henry David Thoreau; Printer: The Spiral Press
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: small hardcover book; green cover with images of bare trees; text with woodcuts--primarily faces of men; mustard yellow end papers
markings: on colophon page, stamped in red: AF (intertwined, inside a circle)
signed: on colophon page, in black: Antonio Frasconi
title: A Vision of Thoreau
